events.message: We've successfully received the application for the Software Engineer position submitted by the candidate. The resume and cover letter have been saved in our system.
The candidate's application has been reviewed and categorized under Engineering for the software developer role based on relevant skills and experience.
A recruiter specialized in the tech vertical has been assigned to the candidate to facilitate the next steps in the interview process and maintain communication.
The recruiter completed the initial screening call to evaluate foundational software engineering knowledge, communication skills, and candidate motivation.
The candidate has replied promptly, expressing enthusiasm for the position and confirming availability for a technical interview next week.
A technical interview with the senior software engineer panel has been scheduled for the candidate on May 8th, focusing on coding and system design skills.
